mapper.select: SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectQuizStatList */ * FROM QUIZ_STAT A WHERE QUIZ_DATE = #{quiz_date} ORDER BY QUIZ_SEQ DESC

SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectQuizListCount */ FORMAT(SUCCESS_CNT, 0) AS SUCCESS_CNT, FORMAT(FAIL_CNT, 0) AS FAIL_CNT, FORMAT(TOTAL_CNT, 0) AS TOTAL_CNT, ROUND(SUCCESS_CNT / TOTAL_CNT * 100, 2) AS SUCCESS_RATE FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT T, QUIZ A WHERE T.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND T.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND A.QUIZ_SOURCE = #{quiz_source} AND T.SUCCESS_YN = 'Y') A, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT T, QUIZ A WHERE T.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND T.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND A.QUIZ_SOURCE = #{quiz_source}) B, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS FAIL_CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT T,QUIZ A WHERE T.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND T.QUIZ_NUMBER =A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND A.QUIZ_SOURCE = #{quiz_source} AND T.SUCCESS_YN <> 'Y') C

SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectQuizDayCount */ FORMAT(SUCCESS_CNT, 0) AS SUCCESS_CNT, FORMAT(FAIL_CNT, 0) AS FAIL_CNT, FORMAT(TOTAL_CNT, 0) AS TOTAL_CNT, ROUND(SUCCESS_CNT / TOTAL_CNT * 100, 2) AS SUCCESS_RATE FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT T, QUIZ A WHERE T.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND T.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND T.QUIZ_DATE=#{quiz_date} AND T.SUCCESS_YN = 'Y') A, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT T, QUIZ A WHERE T.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND T.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND T.QUIZ_DATE=#{quiz_date}) B, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS FAIL_CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT T,QUIZ A WHERE T.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND T.QUIZ_NUMBER =A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND T.QUIZ_DATE=#{quiz_date} AND T.SUCCESS_YN <> 'Y') C
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* QuizStatMapper.insertQuizStat */ QUIZ_STAT(QUIZ_DATE, DOC_CODE, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_SEQ, QUIZ_NUM, SUCCESS_YN, QUIZ_TIMES, CREATE_DATE) VALUES ( date_format(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') , #{doc_code} , #{quiz_number} , #{quiz_seq} , 1 , #{success_yn} , #{quiz_times} , now())
mapper.select: SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectMaxQuizStatSeq */ IFNULL(MAX(QUIZ_SEQ), 0)+1 FROM QUIZ_STAT WHERE QUIZ_DATE = #{quiz_date}

SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectKeywordList */ A.DOC_CODE, A.DOC_NAME,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT, IFNULL(B.SUCCESS_CNT,0) AS SUCCESS_CNT,IFNULL(C.FAIL_CNT,0) AS FAIL_CNT, COALESCE(ROUND(SUCCESS_CNT/(SUCCESS_CNT+COALESCE(FAIL_CNT,0))*100,0),0) AS SUCCESS_RATE FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.DOC_NAME,COUNT(*) AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A, QUIZ_STAT B WHERE B.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND B.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND B.SUCCESS_YN='Y' GROUP BY A.DOC_NAME) B ON A.DOC_NAME = B.DOC_NAME LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.DOC_NAME,COUNT(*) AS FAIL_CNT FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A, QUIZ_STAT B WHERE B.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND B.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND B.SUCCESS_YN!='Y' GROUP BY A.DOC_NAME) C ON A.DOC_NAME = C.DOC_NAME GROUP BY A.DOC_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectKeyword */ (IFNULL(A.SUCCESS_CNT,0) + IFNULL(FAIL_CNT,0)) AS TOTAL_CNT, IFNULL(A.SUCCESS_CNT,0) AS SUCCESS_CNT,IFNULL(B.FAIL_CNT,0) AS FAIL_CNT, COALESCE(ROUND(SUCCESS_CNT/(SUCCESS_CNT+COALESCE(FAIL_CNT,0))*100,0),0) AS SUCCESS_RATE FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A ,QUIZ_STAT B WHERE A.DOC_NAME=#{doc_name} AND A.DOC_CODE = B.DOC_CODE AND A.QUIZ_NUMBER = B.QUIZ_NUMBER AND B.SUCCESS_YN='Y') A, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS FAIL_CNT FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A ,QUIZ_STAT B WHERE A.DOC_NAME=#{doc_name} AND A.DOC_CODE = B.DOC_CODE AND A.QUIZ_NUMBER = B.QUIZ_NUMBER AND B.SUCCESS_YN <> 'Y') B
